About Me

I started the Web Development program at EDCC in the Spring of 2015. I have learned an incredible amount, and am very glad I chose this field as my next career.

In the Fall I will only have to take one class to finish my degree. I'm thrilled to get out there and find a job in this exciting and ever-changing industry!
